column1: 4104740820,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-analyst-at-scalapay-4104740820?position=1&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=yEFTCO6EXOZkKzFgl61qiA%3D%3D,Data Analyst,Scalapay,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","Thanks to our innovative BuyNow PayLater payment solution, Scalapay is transforming the way more than 6.5 million customers buy online and in-store, empowering 8,000+ merchants (online and in-store) to give their customers magical shopping experiences.

Being only 3 years old didn‚Äôt stop us from becoming a unicorn ü¶Ñ We have raised over $700mln and we did this thanks to a team built around our 4 core values: #MakeItHappen #PlayAsATeam #StayCurious #FocusOnCustomer.
This is where your magic happens. If you love it, Scalapay it ‚ô•

Our data team seeks a Data Analyst who will champion a 'data-first' mindset, ensuring precise measurement and reporting of relevant metrics. This role collaborates closely with Scalapay‚Äôs key Business Units such as Product, Marketing and Sales, employing technical expertise to translate concepts into concrete outcomes.
Serve as the data point of reference for our key Business Units, providing them with necessary support
Use advanced analytical tools to assess and interpret sales and marketing data, measuring the effectiveness of activities and pinpointing areas for improvement
Build and maintain comprehensive reports and dashboards for our teams to facilitate data-driven decision-making
Translate business questions into analytical solutions, providing actionable insights
Ensure accuracy and reliability in measuring key performance indicators (KPIs) and the underlying data
Identify trends, patterns, and areas for improvement in order to propose data-driven recommendations to optimise marketing strategies and sales processes
Conduct hands-on work with data, including data cleansing, transformation, and validation
Help us extend a data-driven mindset throughout Scalapay
Be an active member of the Data team, helping to develop and enhance our suite of Business Intelligence tooling.
You‚Äôll be great for this role if:
You have a minimum of 3 years of experience in a data-driven role, ideally with a background in startups or fintech
You have strong SQL skills, Python is a plus
You are proficient in data visualisation tools and data storytelling
You have a background in statistics and can conduct experiments or validate hypotheses
You are fluent in Italian and English: you must be totally confident talking and sharing results in English in a sharp and concise way
You demonstrate outstanding communication skills, both verbally and in writing. You excel at simplifying complex topics into straightforward solutions and ideas
You‚Äôre more than data-driven, you are obsessed with data!
Attractive packages based on skills and experience - the salary we have for this position is up to 40'000‚Ç¨ (Gross Annual Base)
International environment with significant challenges to be met every day
Lots of opportunities to work with a team of industry tech leaders who are focused on delivering products that offer exceptional user experiences
Personalised support to accelerate your professional growth and take ownership of the products you deliver: we want to help you grow!
Latest technologies and being encouraged to bring your flair to the role.
Initial Chat: A brief conversation with our Talent Acquisition team
Hiring Manager Interview: A deep dive into your experience and motivation for the role
Case Study: A skills-based test with a debriefing session involving key stakeholders, conducted in our Milan office
Final Chat with Simone (CEO): An opportunity to discuss Scalapay‚Äôs values and assess cultural alignment.
Want to learn more? Don't hesitate to explore our Careers website, our LinkedIn and Glassdoor pages.
Pro tip: send your CV in English üòâ
Super Pro tip: we know that application processes can be scary and frustrating but‚Ä¶ we look for talent, not people that tick all our boxes.
We believe in the power of diversity: Scalapay is an Equal Opportunity Employer for any minority, disability, gender identity or sexual orientation.

Assist with BI activities, design, functional analysis, upgrading and maintenance
Ensure the effectiveness and efficacy of the Reporting Systems, translating big data in meaningful KPIs and evidence

Be a partner for the Business users for every BI activity, to respond in the most effective and efficient way to the business needs of the different areas (Finance, Planning, Sales, Operation, Logistics, Merchandising, etc.)
Support users to understand their needs, translating them into technical specifications, provide assistance and training
Guarantee the congruence and correctness of data according to the company logic
Involved with SW Architecture activities related to BI
University degree in Computer Science or similar
Experience (at least two years) in a similar position within international environment of customer-oriented companies ‚Äì experience abroad will be considered as a plus
Experience in metadata architecture (logic and physics) and front-end design (multidimensional modeling facts / dimensions, reports, analytical applications)
Knowledge of Oracle Data Base and SQL PL / SqL programming languages, MS Sql Server is a plus
Good knowledge and experience of ETL tools and leading front-end BI tools
column2: knowledge of MicroStrategy. In addition knowledge of Qlik is a plus.

column1: Knowledge of the main Microsoft Office Automation tools and Operating Systems in the Microsoft environment
Ability to communicate results/customers‚Äô insight at business levels facilitating action plans definition
High level of accuracy and problem-solving skills, flexibility and used to work under pressure
Fluent in oral and written English and Italian (other languages are a plus)

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:


  • Assist with BI activities, design, functional analysis, upgrading and maintenance
  • Ensure the effectiveness and efficacy of the Reporting Systems, translating big data in meaningful KPIs and evidence
  • Data Warehouse management
  • Be a partner for the Business users for every BI activity, to respond in the most effective and efficient way to the business needs of the different areas (Finance, Planning, Sales, Operation, Logistics, Merchandising, etc.)
  • Support users to understand their needs, translating them into technical specifications, provide assistance and training
  • Guarantee the congruence and correctness of data according to the company logic
  • Draw up the documentation
  • Involved with SW Architecture activities related to BI


KEY REQUIREMENTS:


  • University degree in Computer Science or similar
  • Experience (at least two years) in a similar position within international environment of customer-oriented companies ‚Äì experience abroad will be considered as a plus
  • Experience in metadata architecture (logic and physics) and front-end design (multidimensional modeling facts / dimensions, reports, analytical applications)
  • Knowledge of Oracle Data Base and SQL PL / SqL programming languages, MS Sql Server is a plus
  • Good knowledge and experience of ETL tools and leading front-end BI tools

knowledge of MicroStrategy. In addition knowledge of Qlik is a plus.

  • High level of accuracy and problem-solving skills, flexibility and used to work under pressure

4157280545,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-analyst-at-centrico-4157280545?position=3&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=jzZe3x%2F2FjJuPAX4WGL37w%3D%3D,Data Analyst,Centrico,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","L‚ÄôOpen Banking √® il nostro DNA!

Centrico ha le sue radici nelle rivoluzioni tecnologiche guidate dal gruppo Sella e dal 2019 √® una realt√† indipendente: creiamo innovazione per il mondo delle banche e della finanza con un sistema informativo aperto, veloce, modulabile e conveniente.
Il nostro obiettivo √® diventare una data driven company!

Per vincere questa sfida, la persona che cerchiamo far√† parte dell‚Äôarea Data Management di Centrico in qualit√† di Data Analyst e si occuper√† di analizzare i dati per fornire insights utili a supporto dei processi decisionali interni al Gruppo.
Analizzerai grandi quantit√† di dati per identificare trend, pattern e insights utili
Creerai report e dashboard per visualizzare i dati in modo chiaro e comprensibile
Collaborerai con team multidisciplinari (Business, IT, Compliance, Risk) per comprendere le esigenze di analisi dei dati e fornire soluzioni data-driven
Supporterai l‚Äôindividuazione di regole e di livelli di controllo dell'accesso ai dati
Contribuirai al miglioramento continuo della piattaforma dati del Gruppo tramite l‚Äôimplementazione di best practice e standard di settore
Esperienza di almeno 4 anni nel medesimo ruolo o in ruolo affine
Conoscenza avanzata di strumenti di analisi dati (es. SQL, Python, R)
Buona conoscenza di strumenti di visualizzazione dati (es. Power BI, Tableau)
Ottime capacit√† relazionali sia verso interlocutori tecnici sia di business
Spiccate capacit√† analitiche e di problem solving
Esperienza con tecnologie di big data (es. Hadoop, Spark)
Conoscenza di tecniche di machine learning e data mining
Esperienza con strumenti di ETL (es. Talend, Informatica)
Certificazioni professionali in ambito data analysis (es. Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate)
Conoscenza di metodologie Agile e Scrum
Un ambiente positivo e in cui il tuo contributo venga apprezzato, la tua opinione √® importante e vogliamo che tu la esprima
Piattaforma e-learning Microsoft: per non smettere mai di imparare e di certificarti
Attivit√† di engagement (tornei di Beach Volley, Padel, Calcetto) e di volontariato aziendale
Cura della persona anche con la polizza sanitaria - per te e il tuo nucleo familiare - e polizza TCM
Supporto al benessere psicologico attraverso Stimulus, uno sportello esterno di ascolto a disposizione dei colleghi e dei loro famigliari
Uno sguardo al tuo futuro attraverso il contributo aziendale al fondo pensione
Sede di lavoro: Milano o Torino o Biella con modalit√† ibrida.

L‚ÄôOpen Banking √® il nostro DNA!


Centrico ha le sue radici nelle rivoluzioni tecnologiche guidate dal gruppo Sella e dal 2019 √® una realt√† indipendente: creiamo innovazione per il mondo delle banche e della finanza con un sistema informativo aperto, veloce, modulabile e conveniente.


Il nostro obiettivo √® diventare una data driven company!

Per vincere questa sfida, la persona che cerchiamo far√† parte dell‚Äôarea Data Management di Centrico in qualit√† di Data Analyst e si occuper√† di analizzare i dati per fornire insights utili a supporto dei processi decisionali interni al Gruppo.


Responsabilit√†:

  • Analizzerai grandi quantit√† di dati per identificare trend, pattern e insights utili
  • Creerai report e dashboard per visualizzare i dati in modo chiaro e comprensibile
  • Collaborerai con team multidisciplinari (Business, IT, Compliance, Risk) per comprendere le esigenze di analisi dei dati e fornire soluzioni data-driven
  • Supporterai l‚Äôindividuazione di regole e di livelli di controllo dell'accesso ai dati
  • Contribuirai al miglioramento continuo della piattaforma dati del Gruppo tramite l‚Äôimplementazione di best practice e standard di settore


Requisiti:

  • Esperienza di almeno 4 anni nel medesimo ruolo o in ruolo affine
  • Laurea in discipline STEM
  • Conoscenza avanzata di strumenti di analisi dati (es. SQL, Python, R)
  • Buona conoscenza di strumenti di visualizzazione dati (es. Power BI, Tableau)
  • Ottime capacit√† relazionali sia verso interlocutori tecnici sia di business
  • Spiccate capacit√† analitiche e di problem solving


Nice to have:

  • Esperienza con tecnologie di big data (es. Hadoop, Spark)
  • Conoscenza di tecniche di machine learning e data mining
  • Esperienza con strumenti di ETL (es. Talend, Informatica)
  • Certificazioni professionali in ambito data analysis (es. Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate)
  • Conoscenza di metodologie Agile e Scrum


Cosa offriamo:

  • Un ambiente positivo e in cui il tuo contributo venga apprezzato, la tua opinione √® importante e vogliamo che tu la esprima
  • Piattaforma e-learning Microsoft: per non smettere mai di imparare e di certificarti
  • Attivit√† di engagement (tornei di Beach Volley, Padel, Calcetto) e di volontariato aziendale
  • Contratto con CCNL del Credito
  • Cura della persona anche con la polizza sanitaria - per te e il tuo nucleo familiare - e polizza TCM
  • Supporto al benessere psicologico attraverso Stimulus, uno sportello esterno di ascolto a disposizione dei colleghi e dei loro famigliari
  • Uno sguardo al tuo futuro attraverso il contributo aziendale al fondo pensione
  • Policy di lavoro flessibile


Sede di lavoro: Milano o Torino o Biella con modalit√† ibrida.

misurare l‚Äôefficacia delle campagne di marketing sia in termini quantitativi che qualitativi attraverso analisi mirate, gestendo l‚Äôintero ciclo di vita del dato: dal data preparation fino alla redazione di executive summary
elaborare contenuti analitici finalizzati all‚Äô approccio data-driven per lo sviluppo di nuove campagne e alla individuazione di nuovi cluster profittevoli
monitorare i principali KPI e KQI mediante report periodici, individuando e condividendo in modo efficace gli insight pi√π significativi con il resto dell‚ÄôUnit√† Organizzativa.

4179621416,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/forecasting-analytics-specialist-at-sky-italia-4179621416?position=6&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=g4omlVZhfh%2Fzwf1QkiiCow%3D%3D,Forecasting & Analytics Specialist,Sky Italia,Greater Milan Metropolitan Area,"Mission

All'interno della direzione Customer Operations & Finance e come membro del Team Contact Forecasting, avrai il compito di analizzare le interazioni dei clienti su tutti i touchpoint per prevederne il comportamento futuro, sulla base di eventi attesi o pianificati. Collaborerai con i team di Customer Operations, Digital, Marketing, Finance e Sales, contribuendo alle iniziative che influenzano il comportamento dei clienti e le loro modalit√† di contatto. Il tuo lavoro sar√† essenziale per garantire valutazioni d'impatto precise e una pianificazione efficace delle attivit√† correlate.
Analizzare la customer base e il comportamento di contatto in base a tipologia di cliente, prodotto, canale, stagionalit√†‚Ä¶
Generare insight per identificare pain point e opportunit√† di miglioramento del customer journey
Elaborare previsioni rolling dei contatti attraverso tutti i canali di interazione (digital e human)
Monitorare e analizzare i delta tra le previsioni e i comportamenti riscontrati
Presentare ai manager insight chiave sul comportamento dei clienti e sull'engagement digitale, rilevando le opportunit√† di ottimizzazione
Esperienza analitica: almeno 3 anni come Data Analyst o Business Analyst
Capacit√† di comprendere le esigenze aziendali e tradurle in analisi concrete e affidabili
Competenza nell'utilizzo di Data Lake in cloud e nella gestione dei dati
Esperienza in analisi descrittiva e A/B testing e capacit√† di sviluppare e ottimizzare modelli statistici per estrarre insight strategici da grandi dataset
Esperienza in analisi predittiva, con focus sulle serie temporali e modelli di machine learning (es. ARIMA, Prophet, LSTM)
Padronanza di strumenti di visualizzazione dei dati (Tableau o Power BI)
Ottima conoscenza di Excel e PowerPoint
Costituisce un plus l'esperienza nell'applicazione di Python per l'analisi dei dati e l'ottimizzazione dei processi
Attitudine al problem-solving e capacit√† di trasformare dati complessi in insight operativi
Orientamento al team, flessibilit√† e buone capacit√† organizzative e di gestione del tempo
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese, scritta e parlata

4185649061,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-visualization-specialist-at-prada-group-4185649061?position=7&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=gW5YPciepNIZ6wX9czkBkg%3D%3D,Data Visualization Specialist,Prada Group,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","Job description:

The ideal candidate will work in the worldwide Data Analytics team based in Milan and will be responsible for managing and coordinating end-to-end data visualization projects. This includes collecting business requirements, designing the most appropriate and efficient data model, and implementing the final data visualization solution.
Design and Implement Data Solutions: Create efficient and effective data solutions for reporting and analysis, working with key stakeholders to build dashboards using enterprise tools like Power BI.
Collect Requirements:¬†Gather technical and business requirements from stakeholders, understand their needs, and support them in designing the optimal data visualization solution.

ETL and Data Manipulation: Build and deploy highly efficient and scalable ETL processes using big data and cloud technologies (e.g., Databricks), collaborating with other IT colleagues such as DWH owners and Data Architects.
Stakeholder Communication:¬†Periodically update main stakeholders about the progress and maintenance of solutions development.
+ 2 years in data analytics and BI roles.
Strong experience with Power BI, designing and implementing dashboards for both desktop and mobile use, and innovative and advanced data analysis tools for enterprises.
Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, Maths, or related STEM discipline.
Good knowledge of SQL or other data analysis programming languages.

Familiarity with data warehouse environments (Oracle, MS SQL Server) and cloud-based data platforms is a plus. Experience with Qlik Sense is a plus. Preferred experience with Agile project management.
Fluent in English and Italian, both written and spoken.
Preferred Experience in the fashion luxury sector would be a plus.

Entra nella practice Customer Transformation di PwC e diventa:

Ti unirai al gruppo di Customer Transformation di PwC su sfidanti progetti di Customer Advance Analytics e Data Science in ambito Consumer Markets, Financial Services, Energy&Utilities e Telco&Media, per supportare le organizzazioni nel valorizzare il patrimonio informativo sui propri Clienti e Consumatori finali, utilizzando i dati a disposizione per sviluppare soluzioni innovative basate su Machine Learning.
Grazie all‚Äôaccesso alle vaste competenze del nostro network internazionale, potrai dare spazio alle tue idee e fornire il contributo innovativo che hai sempre desiderato.
Sarai Coinvolto Con Crescenti Responsabilit√† Nelle Seguenti Attivit√†

Disegno, sviluppo, test e misurazione delle performance di modelli di Machine Learning e di modelli statistici in ambito Marketing: segmentazioni, Customer scoring, modelli di classificazione, modelli predittivi, modelli di propensione/raccomandazione
Analisi dati avanzate sul comportamento dei Clienti sia su canale fisico che digitale attraverso esplorazione di dati strutturati e destrutturati, al fine di derivare insight di business
Sviluppo di analisi quantitative e modelli di Machine Learning a supporto di progettualit√† di data-driven Strategy & Decision Making
Attivit√† di targeting evoluto e valutazione quantitativo-statistica delle campagne di Marketing
Raccolta dei requisiti progettuali a diretto contatto con il cliente per il disegno e l‚Äôelaborazione di soluzioni data-driven
Stai concludendo o hai concluso il percorso di studi o possiedi una laurea magistrale preferibilmente ad indirizzo scientifico (es. Data Science, Informatica, Statistica, Matematica, Fisica)
Hai un‚Äôottima conoscenza di almeno uno tra i linguaggi Python ed R
Possiedi una buona conoscenza dei database relazionali e del linguaggio SQL
Hai forti competenze analitiche e ti interessa usare i dati per trovare soluzioni funzionali, creative ed innovative a problemi complessi
Parli e scrivi in inglese fluentemente
Ti interessa lavorare in team e crescere in un ambiente di lavoro stimolante e positivo
Sei flessibile e hai forte motivazione ad intraprendere una carriera professionale in consulenza
Saranno considerate un plus, le conoscenze, anche a livello base di:
Framework Spark e piattaforme Cloud come Amazon Web Services, Azure e Google Cloud Platform
Artificial Intelligence in ambito Speech Analytics, Natural Language Processing o Computer Vision

Siamo Presenti In Italia Dal 2018, Il Nostro Head Quarter Si Trova a Milano e Con Grande Passione Gestiamo i Nostri Due Brand
Eat Happy: sushi corner all‚Äôinterno dei supermercati, dove i nostri chef preparano ogni giorno a mano del freschissimo sushi e le altre specialit√†, davanti agli occhi dei nostri clienti.

Wakame: in uno stabilimento di oltre 3000 metri quadri sito a Bologna, i nostri chef producono il nostro sushi e le nostre specialit√†, in modo artigianale. Da Bologna viene poi distribuito nei migliori supermercati e posizionato nelle nostre vetrine.
Per continuare l'espansione del nostro gruppo EatHappy in Italia stiamo cercando un:
(Tirocinio curricolare o extracurricolare, Milano, Full time )
Lavorerai Insieme Al Team Finance e Ti Occuperai Di
Raccogliere, organizzare ed interpretare i dati commerciali dei POS tramite strumenti
Monitoraggio costante dei KPI e delle performance dei POS

Elaborazione report periodici a supporto dell‚Äôarea vendite con analisi puntuale dei risultati di vendita
Inserimento delle vendite nei sistemi informativi aziendali
Analizza le performances dei prodotti all‚Äôinterno dei POS per migliorare i risultati
Analizzare e pianificare le previsioni di vendita dei POS, intervenendo in caso di anomalie
Valuteremo la tua candidatura solo se avrai le seguenti caratteristiche:
Laurea o percorso di studio in ambito economico
Conoscenza del pacchetto Office (in particolare Excel)
Capacit√† di lavorare sotto pressione e in un ambiente dal ritmo veloce
Il profilo ideale sta intraprendendo un percorso di studi, o ha conseguito una laurea, in ambito matematico-statistico.
Se sei interessato a unirti al gruppo, non vediamo l'ora di ricevere il tuo CV!

4187402160,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/fraud-data-analyst-at-subito-4187402160?position=14&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=1edNBufcwuWUxD20SCfIFQ%3D%3D,Fraud Data Analyst,Subito,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","We‚Äôre Adevinta, a global leader in digital marketplaces. Our household name brands, including Marktplaats in the Netherlands, mobile.de in Germany and leboncoin in France, reach hundreds of millions of people every month.

We‚Äôre all about matchmaking, and our sites help people find whatever they‚Äôre looking for in their local communities ‚Äì whether it‚Äôs a car, an apartment, a sofa or a new job. Every connection made or item found makes a difference by creating a world where people share more and waste less.

Our brands are supported by global Tech Hubs in Barcelona, Amsterdam, Paris and Berlin. Their goal is to develop common global products and innovation platforms which all of our brands can use. This means using cutting edge technology to create highly scalable, customisable and secure products and components that free up development time and leverage our access to global data.
What You‚Äôll Do & Who You Are

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Fraud Data Analyst to join our Content & Safety team. The Fraud Data Analyst will play a critical role in protecting our users and platform by identifying, analysing, and mitigating fraudulent activities. This position requires a strong analytical mindset, proficiency in data analysis tools, and a passion for problem-solving.
Data Analysis: Collect, analyze, and interpret data from various sources to identify patterns and trends indicative of fraudulent behaviour
Fraud Detection: Help develop and implement fraud detection models and rules to proactively identify and prevent fraudulent activities and non-compliant behaviours in general
Reporting: Prepare and present regular reports on fraud trends, detection rates, and mitigation efforts to management and stakeholders
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including Engineering, Product, and Customer Support, to investigate and resolve fraud cases
Continuous Improvement: Stay up-to-date on the latest fraud trends and techniques, and continuously improve fraud detection and prevention strategies.
Experience: 2+ years of experience in data analysis, preferably in fraud detection, risk management or Trust & Safety area
Experience with data visualisation tools (e.g., Tableau) would be a plus
Detail-oriented: Ability to identify subtle patterns and anomalies in data
Proactive: Takes initiative to identify and address potential fraud risks
Collaborative: Works effectively with cross-functional teams to achieve common goals
Adaptable: Thrives in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
Ethical: Maintains high standards of integrity and confidentiality.
Opportunity to shape the way we work. Your feedback and opinions are valued at all levels of the organisation
Benefits including stock purchase plan and annual bonus plans
Flexibility to work when and how you want - flexible hours, autonomy to set your own agenda, choice of phone and computer
Smart Working Policy - work remotely some of the time, balanced with time in the office together with your team - between 5 and 45 days per quarter in the office depending on each team.
‚ÄòWork from anywhere‚Äô weeks - up to four weeks working from anywhere, as long as you have an internet connection!
Career development, including language classes and Adevinta Academies: specialised content built by our experts on Machine Learning, Agile, Leadership and more

We‚Äôre all about matchmaking, and our sites help people find whatever they‚Äôre looking for in their local communities ‚Äì whether it‚Äôs a car, an apartment, a sofa or a new job. Every connection made or item found makes a difference by creating a world where people share more and waste less.

Our brands are supported by global Tech Hubs in Barcelona, Amsterdam, Paris and Berlin. Their goal is to develop common global products and innovation platforms which all of our brands can use. This means using cutting edge technology to create highly scalable, customisable and secure products and components that free up development time and leverage our access to global data.

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l‚Äôesperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l‚Äôinnovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze pi√π all‚Äôavanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualit√† su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell‚Äôeccellenza, che √® la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.
Entra a far parte di BIP xTech, il Centro di Eccellenza di BIP specializzato in consulenza¬†e servizi innovativi in ambito Data Analytics, Big Data, Data Science, RPA, Cloud, Blockchain e Networking.

In particolare, verrai considerato per far parte di DANA, il Competence Team di xTech che accoglie i nostri consulenti Data Analyst ‚Äì figure professionali che combinano competenze informatiche e statistiche con l‚Äôinteresse per il business e i processi operativi dei nostri clienti. Il team segue progetti di lungo, medio e breve termine, con attivit√† quali:
Estrazione, pulizia, modellazione e analisi dati, con strumenti tipici del settore (quali MS Excel, SQL, SAS e Python)

Automazione di processi operativi tramite modelli MS Excel avanzati, macro VBA, ed eventuali altre tecnologie a supporto

Supporto all‚Äôoperativit√† dei clienti nell‚Äôesecuzione dei processi, utilizzando le proprie competenze tecniche specifiche per individuare ed implementare soluzioni di efficientamento, anche in collaborazione con colleghi xTech con altre specializzazioni
Analisi funzionali in ambito dati e IT

Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Gestionale, Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Ingegneria delle Telecomunicazioni, Informatica, Statistica, Marketing, Economia, Management, Scienze Politiche o altre discipline con metodi quantitativi

Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze
Disponibilit√† per trasferte in Italia e all‚Äôestero
People at the center of our culture
Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialit√† e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.
Lavorare in BIP √® un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.¬†

Avrai la possibilit√† di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivit√† e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l‚Äôautonomia e la capacit√† di assumerti responsabilit√† e metterti in gioco.
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all‚Äôavanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.
Troverai una policy che supporta¬†lo smartworking¬†fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.
Valorizziamo l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunit√† di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversit√† e all‚Äôinclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrit√† e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, pi√π ampi.
Promuoviamo l‚Äôinserimento e l‚Äôintegrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette ‚Äì in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 ‚Äì.
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se c‚Äô√® un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all‚Äôinterno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
L‚Äôiter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
L‚Äôordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database
per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunit√† future.
Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

column2:
Who You Are

We are looking for a Data Analyst to join Subito‚Äôs team. Our mission is to turn data into insights, and get a clear understanding of the Italian market and marketplace industry.

The Data Analyst will be part of the Business Analytics team mainly supporting the Management Team, Finance, Marketing and Sales departments in the decision making process.

The Data Analyst will study user behaviour, evaluate strategic initiatives and new features. Above all, your work will impact the growth of our business.

Your Typical Day

  • Mash up and analyse different data sets to support the business with high-value insights (we have some data engineering heroes, so it‚Äôs more analysing than mashing up!) and structure presentations showing the findings to a variety of stakeholders
  • Formulate/test hypotheses to explain underlying reasons about business dynamics
  • Design clear, automated reports to democratise data access to the whole company
  • Work in a cross functional team, mostly focusing on the business insights generation in collaboration with colleagues of Marketing, Finance and Sales departments
  • Contribute both on short term analysis and long term initiatives, either local or global
  • Dig deep in our data lake and build Machine Learning models to make Subito a smarter product and enhance business understanding

Skills Required

  • 4+ years of experience as Data Analyst / Data Scientist
  • Highly proficient with SQL
  • Knowledge of one or more analytics languages, ideally Python
  • Applied knowledge of statistical techniques
  • Data visualization and presentation skills to match a wide range of audiences

Plus

  • Good English proficiency level
  • Prior experience in a digital company
  • Experience with cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP...)
  • Hands on experience on Data Science projects

Benefits

  • Competitive compensation package
  • Opportunity to shape the way we work. Your feedback and opinions are valued at all levels of the organisation
  • Benefits including stock purchase plan and annual bonus plans
  • Flexibility to work when and how you want - flexible hours, autonomy to set your own agenda, choice of phone and computer
  • Smart Working Policy - work remotely some of the time, balanced with time in the office together with your team - between 5 and 45 days per quarter in the office depending on each team.
  • ‚ÄòWork from anywhere‚Äô weeks - up to four weeks working from anywhere, as long as you have an internet connection!
  • Career development, including language classes and Adevinta Academies: specialised content built by our experts on Machine Learning, Agile, Leadership and more

Company Description

MSX International Group‚ÄØis the leading global provider of outsourced business solutions for the automotive industry making business in more than 80 countries. MSXI‚Äôs deep industry expertise combined with advanced data analytics and custom software solutions improve the performance of automotive dealership networks by increasing revenue, reducing cost, and enhancing customer satisfaction.

Job Description

Junior Data Analyst

40 hours per week, Monday-Friday

Rome / Milan, hybrid

Are you an automotive fan? Do you have experience in the world of data analysis and enjoy providing the best solutions for customers? MSXI has the job for you!

MSX is looking for a proactive and enthusiastic Junior Data Analyst to join our team in Rome or Milan.

The Role

As a Junior Data Analyst, you will support the data management and analysis processes within the organization. Your primary responsibilities will include collecting, organizing, and interpreting data to help guide decision-making processes.

Your Key Tasks Will Be

  • Collaborate with teams to identify business needs and data requirements
  • Create reports, and conduct analyses regarding trainings
  • Applying the procedures in compliance with the company's standards and policies

About You

We would love to welcome a new colleague passionate about the automotive field, oriented to teamwork and taking the good dose of initiative to achieve results. Our ideal Junior Data Analyst has a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in IT, Statistics or similar experience, as well as:

  • Experience in reporting, data analysis
  • Advanced level user of Power BI, HTML, MS Office
  • Experience with Learning Management Systems (Cornerstone)
  • Fully professional Italian and English knowledge
  • Great problem-solving and communication skills
  • Experience of planning complex schedules of activities

If you can demonstrate that you are familiar with data analysis and reporting and you are a team-player, we would like to hear from you!

What‚Äôs in it for you?

At MSX, our employees are the force behind our success. We are dedicated to empowering and encouraging our people and offer flexible working methods to suit all. We are a Disability Confident Committed organisation who takes pride in our diverse workforce.

In Joining MSX, You Can Enjoy

  • Lunch voucher

4189819743,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/bottega-veneta-business-intelligence-assistant-at-bottega-veneta-4189819743?position=21&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=eq%2BK18iLa%2FqDZNZLUnmbdg%3D%3D,BOTTEGA VENETA Business Intelligence Assistant,Bottega Veneta,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","

Inspiring individuality with innovative craftmanship since 1966, creativity lies at the heart of Bottega Veneta. Born in Vicenza, the house is rooted in Italian culture yet maintains a truly global outlook. An inclusive brand with exclusive products, Bottega Veneta is as much of a feeling as it is an aesthetic.
We are currently seeking a Business Intelligence Assistant as part of our dynamic team in Milan, with a starting temporary agency contract.
Be a partner for the business users for every BI activity, to respond in the most effective and efficient way to the business needs of the Finance and Merchandising areas
Support users in the day-by-day activities and collect the internal requests, translating them into technical specifications and provide assistance
Foster a data culture by keeping documentation up to date and provide the right education to end-users
Cooperate with Kering group for specific projects rollout.
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Engineering, Statistics or a related field
Excellent knowledge of the Office suite, especially Excel
Knowledge of Business Intelligence tools such as MicroStrategy, PowerBI and QlikSense
Experience in a similar position within international environment will be considered as a plus
PowerBI dashboard development will be considered a plus
Good knowledge of English both written and spoken
Attitude to problem solving combined with strong professional relational skills to be able to translate business needs into technical terms
Curious, open-minded and focus on team success, high attention to detail.

This is a fabulous opportunity to join the Kering adventure and to actively contribute to the development of the business by becoming part of a global Luxury Group that offers endless possibilities to learn and grow. Talent development is a managerial principle at Kering and we are committed to fostering internal mobility. Our common vision promotes leadership skills and helps every employee to reach their full potential in a stimulating and fulfilling workplace environment.

Kering is committed to building a diverse workforce. We believe diversity in all its forms ‚Äì gender, age, nationality, culture, religious beliefs and sexual orientation ‚Äì enriches the workplace. It opens up opportunities for people to express their talent, both individually and collectively and it helps foster our ability to adapt to a changing world. As an Equal Opportunity Employer we welcome and consider applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of their background.¬†

Global role at Nestl√© IT, Workforce 360 stream
Full-time in the Milan HQ with some flexibility to work remotely
Bachelor's degree in business, computer science, systems analysis, or related studies and experience
5+ years experience as an IT data analyst working on software development projects
Understanding of Agile/DevOps methods and processes is required
Are you a talented Data Analyst ready to join Nestl√© Workforce 360 Everyday Digital team in Milan, Italy?

The Data Analyst role that supports Everyday Digital, involves collecting, analyzing, and interpreting complex data sets to provide actionable insights that support business decision-making. The role is essential for driving data-driven strategies and improving organizational performance across Zone/GMBs /functions to support our Everyday Digital program and Winning with People and Teams OMP priority.
A Day in the Life of a Business Analyst ‚Äì Data Analyst for Everyday Digital
Data Collection: Gather data from various sources, including databases, surveys, and external datasets, ensuring accuracy and relevance
Data Cleaning and Preparation: Clean and preprocess data to eliminate inconsistencies, errors, and missing values, making it suitable for analysis.
Data Analysis: Utilize statistical methods and analytical tools to analyze complex data sets, identifying trends, patterns, and correlations.
Reporting and Visualization: Create comprehensive reports and visualizations (e.g., charts, graphs) to present findings clearly and effectively to stakeholders.
Key Performance Indicator (KPI) Tracking: Monitor and evaluate KPIs to assess business performance and identify areas for improvement.
Collaboration: Work closely with Analaytics, Data & Integrration team (ADI) to build operationally sustainable analytic solutions.
Decision Support: Provide actionable insights and recommendations based on data analysis to support strategic decision-making processes.
Documentation: Maintain thorough documentation of data sources, methodologies, and analysis processes for transparency and reproducibility.
Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for enhancing data collection and analysis processes to improve efficiency and effectiveness.
Data Governance: Ensure compliance with data governance policies and standards, safeguarding data integrity and confidentiality.
What else will make you successful?
Data Analysis Tools: Proficiency in tools such as Excel, SQL, Python, or R for data manipulation and analysis.
Data Visualization: Experience with visualization tools like Power BI, or similar to present data insights effectively.
Understanding of statistical concepts and methods to interpret data accurately and draw meaningful conclusions.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically about data and its implications for business decisions.
A keen eye for detail to ensure data accuracy and identify anomalies or inconsistencies in data sets.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills to convey complex findings to non-technical stakeholders clearly and effectively.
Understanding of the industry and business context to provide relevant insights and recommendations that align with organizational goals.
Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to understand their data needs and provide support.
Strong organizational skills to manage multiple projects, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines effectively.
Willingness to learn and adapt to new tools, technologies, and methodologies as the data landscape evolves.
Understanding of data privacy regulations and governance principles to ensure compliance and ethical handling of data
Only cvs submitted in English will be considered.

Position Snapshot

  • Global role at Nestl√© IT, Workforce 360 stream
  • Located in Nestl√© Milan Headquarters
  • Nestl√© welcomes people with disabilities
  • Permanent contract
  • Full-time in the Milan HQ with some flexibility to work remotely
  • Bachelor's degree in business, computer science, systems analysis, or related studies and experience
  • 5+ years experience as an IT data analyst working on software development projects
  • Understanding of Agile/DevOps methods and processes is required
  • Effective English communication

Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualit√† legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la societ√†. Scopri di pi√π sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinch√© siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un‚Äôorganizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all‚Äôinterno e all‚Äôesterno dell‚Äôorganizzazione.

Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una risorsa da inserire come Data Analyst all‚Äôinterno del team Data Driven Insights. La struttura ha lo scopo di svolgere le analisi dati a supporto delle attivit√† e delle iniziative del Marketing, delle Strutture di vendita, del Customer Service, supportando nell‚Äôidentificazione delle strategie di business ottimali delle Societ√† della Business Unit Mercato.¬†

L‚Äôattivit√† della Business Unit Mercato √® finalizzata alla vendita al dettaglio di energia elettrica e di gas naturale ai clienti del mercato libero e alla commercializzazione ai clienti serviti in regime di tutela. Inoltre, si occupa di fornire servizi di efficienza energetica e di mobilit√† elettrica.

Analisi strategiche a supporto delle decisioni del business, in particolare legate ai fenomeni contingenti di mercato. Aggiornamento periodico delle analisi, continuo adeguamento alle richieste dei clienti interni, proposizione di nuovi approfondimenti. Predisposizione delle viste e delle rappresentazioni per i SAL periodici

Sviluppo di nuovi report o viste sulla base dei requisiti espressi dai clienti interni, seguendo l‚Äôintero processo: dalla parte di analisi dei dati e degli aspetti tecnici alla presentazione dei risultati
Manutenzione evolutiva ed automazione di analisi/report esistenti

Sviluppo di codice per l‚Äôelaborazione automatica di dati estratti dalla Data Platform a supporto delle attivit√† di marketing e vendita della societ√† della BU Mercato e la presentazione dei risultati (analisi statistiche, test di ipotesi, studi di correlazione di variabili, valutazione degli intervalli di confidenza associati alle statistiche prodotte, calcolo di indicatori, variabili derivate e KPI di business, ‚Ä¶)

Padronanza di tecniche di data visualisation
Rappresenta un plus la conoscenza di Power BI, esperienza pratica nell‚Äôuso di BigQuery su Google Cloud Platform ed esperienza pratica di linguaggio Python
Completano il profilo: attitudine al problem solving, proattivit√†, predisposizione al lavoro in team e alla condivisione delle informazioni e ottime doti comunicative e relazionali
Flessibilit√†: settimana lavorativa con venerd√¨ a orario ridotto, flessibilit√† negli orari di entrata/uscita e pausa pranzo

Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una risorsa da inserire come Data Analyst all‚Äôinterno del team Data Driven Insights. La struttura ha lo scopo di svolgere le analisi dati a supporto delle attivit√† e delle iniziative del Marketing, delle Strutture di vendita, del Customer Service, supportando nell‚Äôidentificazione delle strategie di business ottimali delle Societ√† della Business Unit Mercato.

Per quale Business Unit

L‚Äôattivit√† della Business Unit Mercato √® finalizzata alla vendita al dettaglio di energia elettrica e di gas naturale ai clienti del mercato libero e alla commercializzazione ai clienti serviti in regime di tutela. Inoltre, si occupa di fornire servizi di efficienza energetica e di mobilit√† elettrica.

Ti occuperai di
  • Analisi strategiche a supporto delle decisioni del business, in particolare legate ai fenomeni contingenti di mercato. Aggiornamento periodico delle analisi, continuo adeguamento alle richieste dei clienti interni, proposizione di nuovi approfondimenti. Predisposizione delle viste e delle rappresentazioni per i SAL periodici
  • Sviluppo di nuovi report o viste sulla base dei requisiti espressi dai clienti interni, seguendo l‚Äôintero processo: dalla parte di analisi dei dati e degli aspetti tecnici alla presentazione dei risultati
  • Manutenzione evolutiva ed automazione di analisi/report esistenti
  • Sviluppo di codice per l‚Äôelaborazione automatica di dati estratti dalla Data Platform a supporto delle attivit√† di marketing e vendita della societ√† della BU Mercato e la presentazione dei risultati (analisi statistiche, test di ipotesi, studi di correlazione di variabili, valutazione degli intervalli di confidenza associati alle statistiche prodotte, calcolo di indicatori, variabili derivate e KPI di business, ‚Ä¶)

  • Esperienza consolidata del linguaggio SQL

  • Ottima conoscenza del Pacchetto Office

4193165137,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/junior-digital-analyst-at-fifty-five-4193165137?position=39&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=jb6g%2B7J9lTdsPdPXCIy5uQ%3D%3D,Junior Digital Analyst,fifty-five,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","A proposito di fifty-five:¬†

fifty-five √® una data-company di un nuovo genere che aiuta i brand a sfruttare i dati per migliorare il marketing, i media e l'esperienza del cliente grazie a una combinazione di servizi di consulenza e tecnologia specializzata, pilastro del Brandtech Group nel settore data e marketing, propone un'ampia gamma di servizi che fondono consulenza strategica, services cloud, expertise media e miglioramento della customer experience.

fifty-five conta pi√π di 400 esperti digitali. Consulenti digitali, specialisti di tracking e media, ingegneri e data scientist lavorano in sinergia per fornire consulenze di marketing di alto livello e assistenza tecnica ai brand in tutti i settori, in tutto il mondo.

Come partner fidato degli inserzionisti nella gestione dei dati per la loro raccolta, attivazione e valorizzazione,¬† supportiamo le organizzazioni nel divenire realt√† omnicanale efficaci attraverso la gestione dell'ecosistema digitale e l'integrazione con il mondo fisico.

Con sede a Parigi, operiamo su 3 fusi orari dai nostri 10 uffici situati a Parigi, Londra, Ginevra, Milano, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Shenzhen, Taipei, Singapore e New York. Fifty-five attribuisce particolare importanza al benessere dei suoi collaboratori.

Dopo una fase di onboarding approfondito nel nostro ufficio di Milano, utilizzerete la vostra expertise delle soluzioni di web analytics e dei tag management systems (TMS) per svolgere varie mansioni per i nostri clienti.
In qualit√† di Junior Digital Analyst, farete leva sulla vostra padronanza tecnica delle soluzioni di web analytics e dei tag manager (TMS) per svolgere varie mansioni per i nostri clienti.
Implementazione tecnica delle soluzioni tracking dei siti web/mobile o app del cliente, dalla raccolta delle esigenze alla raccolta effettiva dei dati di cui garantirete qualit√† e affidabilit√†
Gestire i progetti a contatto con il cliente (garantendo l'avanzamento delle missioni, pianificazione, strategia di test, consegne) sulle problematiche di raccolta dati Analytics e Media
Condividere le vostre conoscenze e competenze con i clienti e internamente
Mantenere un collegamento permanente con i diversi attori lato cliente/integratore
Sviluppare un know-how operativo dettagliato (TMS & Analytics)
Sviluppare nuove opportunit√† di business in collaborazione con i consulenti responsabili del conto
Partecipare alla definizione dei prodotti e degli strumenti interni dell'azienda
Partecipare alla concezione e al posizionamento dell'offerta tecnologica di fifty-five.
Laureato/a in discipline STEM o economia , con 1 o 2 anni di esperienza nella gestione di progetti di Tracking / Misurazione / Web Analytics.
Esperienza nella gestione progetti interfacciandosi con team digitali ed IT
Conoscenza dei principali strumenti di web analytics¬† (Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, AT Internet...)
column2: Tag Management System (GTM, Launch, Tealium, Commanders Act, ...)

column1: Conoscenze di JavaScript (comprensione e sviluppo di logiche semplici) e Web in generale
Grande passione per le tecnologie e il settore di internet
Competenze in ambiente mobile sono un plus
Conoscenze del funzionamento dei CMP sono un plus
Buona capacit√† di proporre soluzioni perfettamente in linea con le esigenze
Buon livello sia di italiano che di inglese.
I vantaggi di lavorare in fifty-five:¬†
Particolare attenzione all'equilibrio vita privata / vita professionale nel rispetto del diritto alla disconnessione
Un ambiente multiculturale con collaboratori di oltre 20 nazionalit√† diverse
Valori interni incentrati sull'eccellenza, la benevolenza e la condivisione
Formazione continua (e riconosciuta) sull'ecosistema, le tecnologie digitali e sulle soft skills (es: public speaking, gestione del team ecc.)

Possibilit√† di partecipare a progetti interni come Data Hive (un progetto ""tech for good"" promosso dai dipendenti di fifty-five, il cui scopo √® mettere le loro conoscenze e competenze a disposizione di organizzazioni benefiche), DEI@55 (un gruppo di lavoro sui temi della diversit√† e dell'inclusione all'interno di fifty-five e della tecnologia pi√π in generale), Sustainability@55 (un team che aiuta a implementare pratiche sostenibili internamente e presso i nostri clienti).

In fifty-five, siamo convinti che la diversit√† e l'inclusione siano vere forze. Ci impegniamo a garantire parit√† di trattamento di tutte le candidature ricevute, senza distinzione di genere, et√†, origine, orientamento sessuale, stato di salute o opinione politica o religiosa. Incontra il team di fifty-five!
Localizzazione: Corso Giacomo Matteotti 1, CAP 20121 Milano
Tipo di contratto: Contratto di lavoro a tempo pieno e indeterminato

4184235900,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-science-analyst-at-generali-4184235900?position=40&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=R%2FDxB6PJ%2FR7rBONvEZQP0A%3D%3D,Data Science Analyst,Generali,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","For the Central Team of Generali Global Corporate & Commercial (GC&C), we are looking for a Data Science Analyst to join our Insurance Department. Reporting to the Head of Technical Excellence, this position is key to leveraging data insights for comprehensive technical analysis, pricing strategies, and effective portfolio management. With a dynamic, cross-functional approach, the role includes demanding data integration across key domains such as Underwriting, Risk Engineering, and Claims, thereby contributing significantly to the company's strategic objectives. In addition, you will contribute to the development of the sustainability agenda of GC&C, working on carbon emission, green energy, and climate change initiatives.
Supporting the analysis of the overall GC&C portfolio results, trends and patterns
Designing and deploying the portfolio management discipline
Assisting BU in the target setting and supporting BU in achieving targets
Performing data quality checks at all stages of portfolio management
Preparation and steering of Portfolio review meetings
Assisting UW functions in steering the business accordingly.
Working collaboratively on pioneering new actuarial tools, integrating Machine Learning algorithms to enhance predictive capabilities
Actively participate in defining business requirements to evolve the TechEx technology stack, in partnership with Operations
Facilitate training sessions for the GC&C underwriting community on the TechEx tool suite, promoting skill enhancement and tool.
Driving forward GC&C sustainability initiatives also in collaboration with Group Head Office
Contributing to the development of a technical framework to embed Net Zero targets into GC&C underwriting strategy.
The ideal candidate will meet the following requirements:
Studied Actuarial Science, Mathematics or Statistics or other quantitative disciplines, e.g. Engineering, Physics etc.
Quantitative, analytical mindset, problem solving skills
Insurance business processes knowledge experience is welcome
Familiarity with Python and R is valued
Must be fluent in Italian, English, additional languages are an advantage
Generali is a major player in the global insurance industry ‚Äì a strategic and highly important sector for the growth, development and welfare of modern societies.

Over almost 200 years, we have built a multinational group that is present in more than 50 countries, with 470 companies and nearly 82,000 employees. Our group aims to become the standard bearer and industry leader in the European retail insurance market, building on our existing base of 50 million retail clients, out of an overall total of 72 million.

Global Corporate & Commercial is the Generali Group unit developing P&C business and insurance services for medium and large companies. The unit acts on a global scale and deploys an integrated approach at Group level with a central management team and specialized teams active in individual countries. Through GC&C, Generali aims to become a key world player in the corporate-commercial segment.

Generali is proud to be an inclusive employer that considers applicants regardless of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, religion, political views, marital status or philosophy of life.
If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation or assistance, we will support you during the selection process.
For the Central Team of Generali Global Corporate &

4189372026,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/ai-strategist-at-unicredit-4189372026?position=43&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=pxbyLBIciP1g2P5JyqrByQ%3D%3D,AI Strategist,UniCredit,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","At Unicredit we are looking for a Senior Data Scientist / AI Strategist to join the recently formed AI Architecture and Strategy Team. In this role you will have the possibility to be in the forefront of shaping Unicredit AI Strategy across various countries and banking domains, this ranges from Business to control functions and operation. You will be responsible for defining together with key stakeholders the target state for AI in the group alongside the evolutionary roadmap, bridging the gap between technology, innovation and business need.What you can expect from us
Stakeholder Engagement and AI Evangelization across the group at different management levels
AI strategy definition and evolution according to collected and anticipated needs, keeping track of the constantly evolving AI technological landscape.
Align Business Priorities and vision with Architecture and Factory delivery ‚Äì to bridge the gap between stakeholders and delivery squad.
Support and monitor AI Adoption across the organization including KPI tracking and reporting to top management.
Evolve AI Strategy also according to Business and group strategy including digital landscape evolution roadmap.
Help our stakeholders understand how AI can better serve or evolve a specific domain, unlocking new development opportunities for AI adoption in the group.
Ideally, a senior Data Scientist with in-depth knowledge of various AI technologies and methodologies, used to interact with non-technical stakeholders.
Experience in Product Management and Evolution to help steer the effort in our Internal AI Platform development.

column2: presentation and public speaking.

column1: Experience stakeholder engagement and management, including organization senior leadership.
Experience in AI technologies adoption programs close to final users ‚Äì focus on enhancing user interaction with the technology.
Experience in demand collection (preferably in the AI domain) including selling and opportunity scouting experience
Consolidated experience in AI Strategy or similar role, preferably in the FSI industry.
Consultancy background with focus on project/program proposal and activation.
Experience in Digital Strategy and governance roles.
Consolidated knowledge of AI technology from a functional perspective (e.g. what is currently possible with a certain model or stack).
Experience in buy vs make evaluation and strategy definition ‚Äì not only in the AI domain
Hand-on experience in driving strategical digital initiatives with high complexities and multiple stakeholders and counterparts.
Our offer to you¬†#MakeInnovationHappen: Chance to make an impact in terms of transformation.
¬†#UnlockYourPotential: Join a young and stimulating environment.
¬†#UnlockYourPotential: Play a role of autonomy with high visibility and exposure.
¬†#EnjoyTheBest: Access to our Benefits platform with a dedicated budget that you will be able to use to choose the most suitable benefits for you.

About UniCredit GroupUniCredit is a pan-European Commercial Bank with a unique service offering in Italy, Germany, Central and Eastern Europe. Our purpose is to empower communities to progress, delivering the best-in-class for all stakeholders, unlocking a better tomorrow for our clients and our people across Europe. We serve over 15 million customers worldwide. They are at the heart of what we do in all our markets. Digitalisation and our commitment to ESG principles are key enablers for our service. They help us deliver excellence to our stakeholders and creating a sustainable future for our clients, our communities and our people.
We are an equal opportunity employer. We stand together in nurturing a workplace that welcomes diverse thinking and inclusive behaviors.

Making all voices heard and leveraging ""diversity of thought"" regardless of gender identity, age, race, ethnicity, sexual orientation, ability, cultural background, we ensure sustainable growth and new business opportunities, a strong drive for innovation and creativity, as well as a general improvement of the work climate with positive impact on productivity, well-being and engagement of our people.

At Unicredit we are looking for a Senior Data Scientist / AI Strategist to join the recently formed AI Architecture and Strategy Team. In this role you will have the possibility to be in the forefront of shaping Unicredit AI Strategy across various countries and banking domains, this ranges from Business to control functions and operation. You will be responsible for defining together with key stakeholders the target state for AI in the group alongside the evolutionary roadmap, bridging the gap between technology, innovation and business need.What you can expect from us
  • Stakeholder Engagement and AI Evangelization across the group at different management levels
  • AI strategy definition and evolution according to collected and anticipated needs, keeping track of the constantly evolving AI technological landscape.
  • Align Business Priorities and vision with Architecture and Factory delivery ‚Äì to bridge the gap between stakeholders and delivery squad.
  • Support and monitor AI Adoption across the organization including KPI tracking and reporting to top management.
  • Evolve AI Strategy also according to Business and group strategy including digital landscape evolution roadmap.
  • Help our stakeholders understand how AI can better serve or evolve a specific domain, unlocking new development opportunities for AI adoption in the group.
What we expect from you
  • Ideally, a senior Data Scientist with in-depth knowledge of various AI technologies and methodologies, used to interact with non-technical stakeholders.
  • Experience in Product Management and Evolution to help steer the effort in our Internal AI Platform development.
  • Top Notch communication skills
column2:
presentation and public speaking.
  • Experience stakeholder engagement and management, including organization senior leadership.
  • Experience in AI technologies adoption programs close to final users ‚Äì focus on enhancing user interaction with the technology.
  • Experience in demand collection (preferably in the AI domain) including selling and opportunity scouting experience
    • Nice to have:
    • Consolidated experience in AI Strategy or similar role, preferably in the FSI industry.
    • Consultancy background with focus on project/program proposal and activation.
    • Experience in Digital Strategy and governance roles.
    • Consolidated knowledge of AI technology from a functional perspective (e.g. what is currently possible with a certain model or stack).
    • Experience in buy vs make evaluation and strategy definition ‚Äì not only in the AI domain
    • Hand-on experience in driving strategical digital initiatives with high complexities and multiple stakeholders and counterparts.




    Our offer to you

They help us deliver excellence to our stakeholders and creating a sustainable future for our clients, our communities and our people.

We are an equal opportunity employer. We stand together in nurturing a workplace that welcomes diverse thinking and inclusive behaviors.

NEXiD √® una digital company che supporta le aziende nella trasformazione digitale attraverso progetti end to end. Il modus operandi che ci distingue √®: from vision to execution.

Posizione:

Per NEXiD cerchiamo: DATA ANALYST

Requisiti:

IL PROFILO CHE CERCHIAMO

‚ÄúPerch√© sceglieremo te‚Äù

  • Laurea in una delle seguenti discipline: Informatica, Fisica, Ingegneria Matematica, Ingegneria Gestionale, Matematica, Statistica, Economia o affini.

  • Capacit√† di utilizzare le principali librerie Python per la manipolazione dei dati come Pandas e Matplotlib
  • Capacit√† di scrivere query complesse, inclusivo dell‚Äôuso di JOIN.
  • (Nice to have) Familiarit√† con la creazione di stored procedures.
  • Buona padronanza di Microsoft Excel, incluso l‚Äôutilizzo delle tabelle pivot e strumenti di analisi dati.
  • Conoscenza ed esperienza pratica nell‚Äôutilizzo di Power BI:
    • Creazione di report/dashboard interattive
    • Utilizzo del linguaggio DAX
    • (Nice to have) Capacit√† di progettare modelli semantici.
  • (Nice to have) Conoscenza di altri strumenti di visualizzazione dati come Tableau o Qlik.
  • Capacit√† di comunicare in modo chiaro e strutturato i ragionamenti e le logiche sottostanti ai dati analizzati, traducendoli in insight comprensibili per gli stakeholder.

Saranno considerate come valore aggiunto alcune soft skill che contraddistinguono i nostri collaboratori:

  • Orientamento al lifelong learning
  • Adattabilit√†
  • Capacit√† di team work
  • Comunicazione efficace e costruttiva
  • Proattivit√† e autonomia
  • Tech enthusiasm

Altre informazioni:

COSA OFFRIAMO

‚ÄúPerch√© scegliere noi‚Äù

  • Avrai inoltre la possibilit√† di lavorare fin da subito a contatto con i nostri clienti, inoltre il tuo lavoro sar√† adeguatamente seguito e supportato dal Management NEXiD.
  • Avrai accesso a formazione sulle metodologie, i tool e le tecnologie usate in NEXiD e potrai ottenere svariate certificazioni.

SEDE DI LAVORO: Milano (ibrido)

INQUADRAMENTO:

  • CCNL Metalmeccanici
  • Contratto di Stage o Apprendistato

Se sei un talento che vuole contribuire fin dal primo giorno all‚Äôinnovazione, sei nel posto giusto!

4196509421,https://it.linkedin.com/jobs/view/finance-data-analyst-apprendistato-at-siemens-healthineers-4196509421?position=45&pageNum=0&refId=4wIG1WUhBauNbsiq4WMEyQ%3D%3D&trackingId=rvIGMtm2oO6qYYFNZYlYiA%3D%3D,Finance Data Analyst - Apprendistato,Siemens Healthineers,"Milan, Lombardy, Italy","Join us in pioneering breakthroughs in healthcare. For everyone. Everywhere. Sustainably.

Our inspiring and caring environment forms a global community that celebrates diversity and individuality. We encourage you to step beyond your comfort zone, offering resources and flexibility to foster your professional and personal growth, all while valuing your unique contributions.

Apply now for the position of Finance Analyst for the Southern Europe Business Performance Controlling Department in our Headquarter in Milan and you will carry out FP&A activities for the country and take part in the harmonization processes taking place on the 4 countries of the zone.
Data Collection and Analysis: gathering and analyzing financial data to support planning and decision-making.
Budget Preparation Support: assisting in the preparation of annual budgets and financial forecasts.
Performance Monitoring: tracking financial performance against budgets and forecasts, identifying variances.
Strategic Decision Support: providing analytical support for strategic decisions, such as investment evaluations.
Cross-functional Collaboration: working closely with other departments to ensure financial decisions align with overall business goals.
Master‚Äôs degree in economics, Statistics, Computer Science, Math or Engineering.
Good understanding of Office suite and Business Intelligence tools.
Interpersonal skills, result oriented, proactivity, autonomy, relational skills, team working.
Good knowledge of English and Italian language (spoken, written).
Knowledge of programming languages (i.e. SQL, Python, R, etc.)
Experience in applied Machine Learning and Predictive Analytics.
Deep knowledge of business intelligence tools.
To find out more about the specific business, have a look at www.siemens-healthineers.com.

We are a team of more than 71,000 highly dedicated Healthineers in more than 70 countries. As a leader in medical technology, we constantly push the boundaries to create better outcomes and experiences for patients, no matter where they live or what health issues they are facing. Our portfolio is crucial for clinical decision-making and treatment pathways.

When you join Siemens Healthineers, you become one in a global team of scientists, clinicians, developers, researchers, professionals, and skilled specialists, who believe in each individual‚Äôs potential to contribute with diverse ideas. We are from different backgrounds, cultures, religions, political and/or sexual orientations, and work together, to fight the world‚Äôs most threatening diseases and enable access to care, united by one purpose: to pioneer breakthroughs in healthcare. For everyone. Everywhere. Sustainably. Check our Careers Site at https://jobs.siemens-healthineers.com/careers.
As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome applications from individuals with disabilities.

We care about your data privacy and take compliance with GDPR as well as other data protection legislation seriously. For this reason, we ask you not to send us your CV or resume by email. Please create a profile within our talent community and subscribe to personalized job alert that will keep you posted about new opportunities.

Siemens Healthineers' recruitment is internally managed, with external support permitted only when a qualified supplier has established a formal contract with us. Unsolicited candidate submissions and referrals, absent a current supplier contract, do not establish consent and are ineligible for fees. We delete and destroy unsolicited information, thus, would recommend you refrain from any such practices. Your adherence to our policies is appreciated.

Probabilmente stai pensando... ‚ÄúSembra abbastanza interessante‚Äù. Siamo d'accordo!

Oltre a ottimi colleghi e progetti coinvolgenti, ci sono molti modi in cui possiamo aiutarti a fare il miglior lavoro della tua vita. Abbiamo modellato la nostra offerta ponendo l'attenzione sul benessere, sull'autonomia e sullo sviluppo del dipendente. Vediamo i benefici come il carburante che ti dar√† il potere di avere successo, se deciderai di intraprendere questo viaggio con noi.

Abbiamo persino una politica che ti consente di lavorare da qualsiasi location per 30 giorni all'anno. Confidiamo in te per guidarci avanti.
üèÅ La libert√† di esplorare le possibilit√† Forse in Prima ci muoviamo velocemente, ma lo facciamo insieme. Siamo impegnati nella tua crescita

Siamo alla ricerca di talenti da inserire come Data Analyst all'interno del dipartimento Online Sales .

In questo ruolo avrai il compito di analizzare l‚Äôintera journey di vendita del cliente che avviene attraverso tutte le properties digitali (sito, App, aggregatori, customer care, partnership), dalla prima interazione al rinnovo. Dovrai mappare le dinamiche e le abitudini degli utenti nei vari touchpoint con Prima, al fine di migliorare le performance degli attuali canali di vendita, nonch√© di migliorare il valore generato da ciascun cliente. Il tuo lavoro influir√† direttamente sulla strategia di vendita diretta e i risultati economici dell‚Äôazienda, una chiave fondamentale per la crescita e la sostenibilit√† di Prima.
Nello Specifico, Sarai Responsabile Di Queste Attivit√†
Impostare sistema di analisi per attivit√† in termini di risultati e performance con estrazioni da DB
Creare modelli analitici di monitoraggio utilizzando Tableau e Python per supportare le decisione strategiche del team
Collaborare, supportare e comunicare con i vari stakeholders dati e risultati inerenti alle attivit√† del canale di vendita online
Analizzare le performance di vendita per canale, tipologia di prodotto e cliente, al fine di individuare opportunit√† di crescita e di eliminare possibili frizioni all‚Äôacquisto
Ottimizzare la journey del cliente, analizzando le diverse interazioni lungo tutti i touchpoint con il cliente, al fine di migliorare massimizzare i KPI di vendita
Implementare modelli di attribuzione per isolare e misurare l‚Äôimpatto delle varie iniziative online
Analizzare l'impatto atteso da nuove iniziative/prodotti, supportando la costruzione dei relativi business case.
Buona conoscenza nella creazione di dataset utilizzando linguaggi per l‚Äôestrazione di dati (MySQL, Redshift, PostgreSQL)
Capacit√† di fare analisi e creare modelli utilizzando Python, Tableau e Excel
Proattivit√† e voglia di mettersi in gioco, all‚Äôinterno di un team nuovo, dinamico e trasversale
Capacit√† logiche e analitiche: padroneggi velocemente argomenti molto complessi e riesci a modellizzarne le dinamiche e i rapporti causa-effetto.
Curiosit√† e passione: hai uno sguardo critico e ti chiedi sempre come puoi migliorare le cose. Sei attratto dalle nuove tecnologie e da tutte le tematiche che abbracciano l‚Äôinnovazione.

Elasticit√† ed attitudine al cambiamento: reagisci positivamente ai cambiamenti, accettando le sfide continue che incontri. Sei elastico e ben predisposto a lavorare con persone dal background e forma mentis diversi dai tuoi.
Oltre ai requisiti di base, valuteremo con particolare attenzione queste caratteristiche:
Hai avuto esperienze internazionali (e.g. erasmus, stage) e parli inglese fluentemente
Sai usare almeno un software di Business Intelligence e data visualization (e.g. Tableau).
1-2 anni di esperienza pregressa in societ√† di analisi dei dati, consulenza o simili ( nice to have)
Hai solide basi di statistica inferenziale, probabilit√†, modellizzazione matematica, algoritmi statistici e tecniche di machine learning
Sai programmare in Python (e/o R) e conosci le principali librerie di analisi dati (e.g. Pandas, NumPy, SciPy)

Prima √® una comunit√† composta da individui talentuosi e ambiziosi. Offriamo pari opportunit√† di impiego e siamo orientati verso la diversit√† e l'inclusione sul luogo di lavoro. Vietiamo qualsiasi forma di discriminazione basata su razza, colore, genere, religione, orientamento sessuale, nazionalit√†, disabilit√†, informazioni genetiche, gravidanza o altre caratteristiche personali protette, come definite dalle leggi nazionali.

We want to innovate the financial services offered by commercial/retail banks in Italy in the areas of wealth management, credit lending, risk management and compliance. Building on our consolidated expertise and product offering in the Capital Markets domain, we want to scale our solutions and frameworks to the commercial/retail banking industry. To do so, we start from the quantitative modelling and analysis of the current processes put in place by our customers, so that we can profile opportunities of automation and prioritize client needs on manual/painful workflows. The resource will be involved in business process analyses of Italian commercial/retail financial institutions and is expected to integrate structured information extracted from interviews with the analysis of literature and documentation to build a quantitative picture of the AS-IS. The analysis will then be complemented with a consequent implementation analysis and product roadmap definition to design the TO-BE and drive product evolutions and developments. The project entails modelling complex business contexts, extracting structured information from unstructured sources, performing quantitative analyses, presenting findings and recommendations to external clients and internal stakeholders, contributing to the definition of product backlogs.
What You Will Learn During Your Intern
Codification of customer requirements, needs, activities
Business intelligence with PowerBI/Excel - Packaging high-quality deliverables for external clients ‚Äì
Data manipulation with Pandas or Spark/Hive
Hands-on experience with BI tools (Excel, PowerBI)
Experience with Python data science libraries (pandas, pyspark, sklearn) is nice to have
We Are Looking For Someone Who
is passionate about modelling unknown business contexts with a quantitative approach
can find a good trade-off between quality and speed of delivery
proactively contribute your insights and ideas in a way that fits existing frameworks of the firm
is fond of sharing knowledge with colleagues and documenting your work

At ION

We want to innovate the financial services offered by commercial/retail banks in Italy in the areas of wealth management, credit lending, risk management and compliance. Building on our consolidated expertise and product offering in the Capital Markets domain, we want to scale our solutions and frameworks to the commercial/retail banking industry. To do so, we start from the quantitative modelling and analysis of the current processes put in place by our customers, so that we can profile opportunities of automation and prioritize client needs on manual/painful workflows. The resource will be involved in business process analyses of Italian commercial/retail financial institutions and is expected to integrate structured information extracted from interviews with the analysis of literature and documentation to build a quantitative picture of the AS-IS. The analysis will then be complemented with a consequent implementation analysis and product roadmap definition to design the TO-BE and drive product evolutions and developments. The project entails modelling complex business contexts, extracting structured information from unstructured sources, performing quantitative analyses, presenting findings and recommendations to external clients and internal stakeholders, contributing to the definition of product backlogs.

What You Will Learn During Your Intern

  • Quantitative modelling of business processes
  • Codification of customer requirements, needs, activities
  • Business intelligence with PowerBI/Excel - Packaging high-quality deliverables for external clients ‚Äì
  • Data manipulation with Pandas or Spark/Hive

What You Need To Know

  • Hands-on experience with BI tools (Excel, PowerBI)
  • Experience with Python data science libraries (pandas, pyspark, sklearn) is nice to have
  • Fluent English

We Are Looking For Someone Who

  • is passionate about modelling unknown business contexts with a quantitative approach
  • can find a good trade-off between quality and speed of delivery
  • proactively contribute your insights and ideas in a way that fits existing frameworks of the firm
  • is fond of sharing knowledge with colleagues and documenting your work
